      • detectChangesAndApply

        public ClientCompanyInfo detectChangesAndApply(UpdateInvoiceDTO updateData,
                                               ClientCompanyInfo company)
        This method will compare a ClientCompanyInfo's attributes(variables) with a DTO's, to find differences. In case differences are found, the company will either be updated in the database and on the invoice, or the new company will be stored in the database and will replace the current company on the invoice. In case company is deleted, it will be removed from the invoice. In the case that the current company is replaced by either a new company or is deleted entirely, the program will keep the old company in the database for future reference(s).
        Parameters:
        updateData - the DTO that holds new data (or data to remain the same for that matter).
        company - the ClientCompanyInfo(company) object of the invoice to be updated.
        Returns:
        the ClientCompanyInfo object to set to the updated invoice.

      • setClientCompanyInfoFields

        private ClientCompanyInfo setClientCompanyInfoFields(UpdateInvoiceDTO updateData,
                                                     ClientCompanyInfo company)
        Parameters:
        company - the ClientCompanyInfo object of the invoice to be updated.
        updateData - The object containing updated values.
        Returns:
        a ClientCompanyInfo object with the updated values, or null if a company does not exist for the issued invoice.

      • getCompanyAttributes

        private java.lang.String[] getCompanyAttributes(UpdateInvoiceDTO company)
                                         throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Parameters:
        company - Object, whose certain values will be used to create an array for comparison purposes.
        Returns:
        an Array containing values related to a ClientCompanyInfo object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - when a null variable is accessed.

      • getCompanyAttributes

        private java.lang.String[] getCompanyAttributes(ClientCompanyInfo company)
                                         throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Parameters:
        company - ClientCompanyInfo object,whose values will be used to create an array for comparison purposes
        Returns:
        an Array containing values that could be appended by a user. It will be used to compare previous values of an invoice's ClientCompanyInfo object and the values inputted by the user.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - when a null variable is accessed.
